terminologie_extrait.contexte: comparing arm relaxation to a rubber band

relaxing-the-arm_.diagnostic: Tight muscles in the playing arm cost power and control.

debutant.step: Take a long warm-up or shadow-stroke.
Relax both arms at the start of a point.

intermediaire.step: Tense the arm muscles tightly for about five seconds, then relax.

exercices_complementaires.description: Stroke without a ball to warm up and relax arms.

erreurs_a_eviter.pitfall: Resisting someone pulling your arm up or down while stroking, indicating tight muscles.
